General.Name: Hunan Zhenghong Science and Technology Develop Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Zhenghong Science and Technology Develop Co.,Ltd. engages in research and development, production, and sale of various feed products under the Zhenghong brand in China. It is involved in purchase and processing of grains; sale of feed raw materials; investment and development of bioengineering technology projects; breeding and sale of pigs; leases its properties; meat production and processing; and import and export trade businesses, as well as development of industrial agricultural products. Hunan Zhenghong Science and Technology Develop Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Yueyang, China.
